problem.display_name: Graded question - Numerator Quality Parameters - Question 1
problem.markdown:
How can you change the thresholds that are displayed on the WHO DQ tool dashboard Consistency - data tab?
>>Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts) <<
(x) A. Change the value in the numerator relations tab in the administration page ( ) B. It cannot be changed ( ) C. In the dashboard itself ( ) D. In the maintenance app [explanation] Change the value in the numerator relations tab in the administration page is correct. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: How can you change the thresholds that are displayed on the WHO DQ tool dashboard Consistency - data tab?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts)

choicegroup.choice: A. Change the value in the numerator relations tab in the administration page

div.p: Change the value in the numerator relations tab in the administration page is correct.
